events.description: Bring your instruments, set the stage on fire and make the crowd go crazy with some mind-blowing performances and show us who owns the stage in this battle!
rules: The band size is supposed to be 8 members at maximum.
Limit performance time to 18 minutes(including setup)
Eastern and western performances are allowed.
SAM ID / online registration is a must.
Video to be submitted for shortlisting (5 mins max, send it to musicclub.iiitdm@gmail.com)
Participant can perform only for one band. Extra points for original compositions!
Only a drum kit and keyboard stand will be provided.
Decision of the judges is final and binding.
Any act of misconduct will lead to immediate disqualification.
events.prize:
First Place - Prizes worth 20K 
 Second Place - Prizes worth 15K

events.description: You’re insecure, don’t know what for! Come sing with us and rock the floor. Calling all the hummers, profes- sionals and wannabes to sing your heart out, be it kara- oke or not.
rules: Any genre of music is allowed.
SAM ID / online registration is a must:on-spot registration at the last moment will not be allowed
Video to be submitted for shortlisting (4 mins max,send it to musicclub.iiitdm@gmail.com)
Final performance should be under 5 minutes.
Participant may use a karaoke or any accompanying instrument (played by him/her or another one person) though only vocals will be judged.
Decision of the judges is final and binding. Any act of misconduct will lead to immediate disqualification.
events.prize:
First Place- Prizes worth 6K
Second Place- Prizes worth 3K

events.description: Clear shot. Kill streaks. No luck. Solemn skills.Gather your mates, plan your strategy and take it all.
rules: All matches will be played on Counter-Strike: Global Offensive servers with the latest game patch of “Counter-Strike: Global Offensive”. A knife round will determine who willstart as Counter-Terrorists (CT) and as Terrorists (T).A match consists of 30 rounds. Each team has to play 15 rounds as Counter-Terrorists (CT) and 15 rounds as Terrorists (T). The team winning 16 rounds out of 30 wins the match.

Incase of a 15-15 draw 4 rounds will be played (2 ct / 2 t). 3 win,
  • Round time - 1 min 45 sec;/li>
  • Buy time – 15 sec;/li>
  • C4 timer – 40 sec;
  • freeze time – 6 sec.
  • fTime out(2 per team)- 60 sec
  • Time out(2 per team)- 60 sec

During a game Team Captain: Each team must present have 1 (one) representative. He is responsible for histeam and will be responsible for choosing maps and all communication with referees must bedone through the team captain.

Picks and Bans - he map pool consists of the following five (7) maps,
  • Mirage
  • Cache
  • Overpass
  • Train
  • Nuke
  • Dust
  • Inferno

ALL matches are 'Best-of-One' matches (Bo1), both teams alternately eliminate one (1) mapuntil only one (1) map is left .The remaining map will be played. The team mentioned first in the match details starts with the procedure. Map votes will be done before the match starts

Results and Tie Breaker - If too many teams have the same score and it's therefore not clear who moves on to the next stage the following criteria are used to determine the exact ranking:,
  • Match wins Overall
  • Match wins Head to Head
  • Score Difference Head to Head
events.prize: First Place - Prizes worth 7K Second Place - Prizes worth 4K Third Place - Prizes worth 2K

events.description: Experience what it takes to control your favourite player. Play to prove the pride of your jersey and shoot for victory.
rules:
1.The game version that will be played is FIFA 19(1v1).(Mode of matches will be Knock Out).
2. Knockout round halftime - 4mins;semis - 5 mins; Finals - 6 mins (tentative).
3. It is highly advised to bring YOUR OWN controller and keyboard. Laptop will be provided.
4. Opponents will be drawn randomly.
5.Participants will be only given limited amount of prep time.(configuring,managing,etc..)
6. there won't be any home and away in the final game, in case of tie in final, extra time followed by penalties shall take place.
7. A match once started won't be restarted again without any coordinators permission.

events.description: A collaborative online event between writers and artists where you interpret the art/story from that of other contestants. Creativity to its core!
rules:
Takes place over as pan of 1 week (Including registration),
  • Monday-Wednesday:registration period for both writers and artists
  • Wednesday 23:59 :prompts are sent to writers only, given up till Friday afternoon to submit a work of min 500 words
  • Friday afternoon to Friday 23:59 : Artists should choose pieces to work on.
  • Saturday 00:00 : Artists get their allotted pieces and can create any art piece in relation with the written piece till Sunday 23:59
  • Registration window will be open for 12 hours. Afterwhich writers will be given a set of prompts to pick and choose from.
Writers will be allowed to choose one or many prompts,how many ever required to write their story.
The story should have a minimum of 500 words and should be submitted within 24 hours of the registration deadline. This is to ensure the artists will have a written piece to work on.
Written works should be submitted via Google docs(to avoid artists unable to figure out handwriting thus making it difficult for them to draw)

Artists will then be given a 6 hour window to select the works they feel inspired by, and to ensure that no two artists pick the same work, they will provide a top 5 list and will be given a story in their top 5.
Artists will then be given a 24 hour window to come up with an art piece depicting the written work they have chosen, interpreting the text and scenes as they see fit.
Failure to submit the work on time or provide SAMID at the time of submission will lead to immediate disqualification.
events.prize:
First Place- Prizes worth 2K + Surprise Gift
Second Place- Prizes worth 1K + Surprise Gift
Third Place - Prizes worth 0.5K

events.description: Let the film roll out of the canister to capture the actor in you and weave it into an amazing short film.
Climate change is an alarming hazard. So make the mankind feel the guilt of befouling the environment through your hard-hitting photos.
Put your thinking caps on and brace up for a flaming quiz on kollywood.
Add fuel to the event with your arguments, a cutthroat debate where ingenious play with words would fetch a victory.
'Every end has a new beginning' is what the game is all about, also have an eye on the fleeting clock.
Bring out the Kalki in you and deliver the most interest- ing story of all and win big.
As we have entered a new decade, let us take a look at all the facts and achievements that India and her people have conquered over the 70 years of her free- dom and over centuries of her history.

Seen all the Marvel movies till date? Able to quote Chandler by heart? Watched so much anime you can understand Japanese? Well, this quiz is for you! Test your trivia over various fandoms and earn something more than just money!

Think you know the latest trends on Instagram? Can you tell the difference between the floss and the nae nae? Put the hours of mindlessly scrolling through your phone to use and try your luck at the meme quiz!

Think you know the latest trends on Instagram? Can you tell the difference between the floss and the nae nae? Put the hours of mindlessly scrolling through your phone to use and try your luck at the meme quiz!
It's time to glint in the spotlight! All you have to do is stir the emotions of audience with your expressions. So, make up your crew and stun the mob with an awe- struck performance.
You need not be a chef to cook up stories, just season your creativity with some spontaneity and you are an improv king.

A well-written script creates in the mind of the reader the experience of watching a movie. To that end, you must describe images, sounds, actions, and speech in such a way that the scenes unspool as they would on a screen.
AA collaborative online event between writers and artists where you interpret the art/story from that of other contestants. Creativity to its core!

Many dreams and ideas have existed in our rich history of human civilization. But, could those ideologies still be applicable today? Could you convince us of such a dream? Come and test your eloquence and glib of tongue and present us with ways on how to learn from the past to change the future.

In a time where ideas are in constant clash and flux of each other, it’s time to play the part of the judge and the jury in determining their usefulness. The goal? To convince the judges and the audience (jury) on who is right.
Are you ready to fight in a 500 square foot, adrenaline pumping, action packed active play experience? With thousands of blasters, millions of darts, live the life of a true NERF fan!
What is buried may never be found! Not true? Come dig to win big.
A game for those who seek to leave their troubles behind. Beware, do not begin unless you intend to finish.
Pitch your ideas, advertise them and help us assimilate your business strategy and win big.
Bring out the creativity, time management, marketing skills of your innovative minds and show us that the best team coordination always wins.
Dreams are the treasures that gets your life going. Par- ticipate in this dreamhunt event to hunt and find yours.

When it comes to fashion, event design creativity is everything. Just like the fashion designers you’re work- ing with, you want to get better each time you design a new catwalk. From venue selection to backdrops to lighting to curating an exclusive experience, it’s time to strut your stuff. Walk your way through to the goal, Miss/Mr Samgatha.
